ygData.subject: RE: Time for another Sylly Survey
ygData.msgSnippet: My answers (take some of this with a grain of salt) Day of the week to play:  Weekends Time of day: Early Morning & Late Night Longest stretch of continuous
ygData.messageBody:
My answers (take some of this with a grain of salt)

Day of the week to play: Weekends
Time of day: Early Morning & Late Night
Longest stretch of continuous play: 8 hours
Way to have game sounds: Turned way low
Distance to sit from display: very close
TV show to have on: N/A
Music to listen to: The sound of my pummeling MOBs
Beverage (non-alcoholic): Water
Beverage (alcoholic): Pabst Blue Ribbon baby!
Health Food: Health food? What's that?
Junk Food: Copenhagen
Clothes to wear: Naked


-----Original Message-----
From: James Schuldes [mailto:jgs@...]
Sent: Wednesday, October 06, 1999 2:34 PM
To: 'eqbards@onelist.com'
Subject: [eqbards] Time for another Sylly Survey


From: James Schuldes <jgs@...>

As we all know, the right atmosphere is required for total immersion into
character so...

When playing your bard in Norrath what is your favorite:

Day of the week to play:

Time of day:

Longest stretch of continuous play:

Way to have game sounds:

Distance to sit from display:

TV show to have on:

Music to listen to:

Beverage (non-alcoholic):

Beverage (alcoholic):

Health Food:

Junk Food:

Clothes to wear:

My answers...

Day of the week to play: long Weekends

Time of day: 8pm to 6am Central time

Longest stretch of continuous play: 30 hours

Way to have game sounds: Dolby Surround (but have to go to head phones a
lot)

Distance to sit from display: up real close

TV show to have on: The Weather Channel

Music to listen to: Rivervale Happy music or Aviak TreeHouse Theme

Beverage (non-alcoholic): Iced tea

Beverage (alcoholic): Vodka Martini

Health Food: n/a

Junk Food: jerkey - beef or turkey

Clothes to wear: Hawaiian shirt & Bermuda shorts
